evidence.text:
Person A: With all due respect, Your Honor, this has not been a typical deliberation.
Person B: I see. Mr. Resnick. Any objections?

Person B: Yes, your honor.
Person A: In the matter of State V. James Michael Sythe, Case No. CR2021- 1715532, Count 1, Malice Murder
Person A: “We the jury find James Michael Sythe GUILTY of Malice Murder.” Dated and signed this day, Denice Aldworth, foreperson.
Person A: Madame Foreperson, to the best of your knowledge, was that your verdict in the jury room, was it freely and voluntarily given, and is it still your verdict?
Person B: Yes, Your Honor.
